_meanings:
{@--3@} Drawing together,
attraction, diverting;  
{#kaTArasasyAkzepasAmaMrTyaM#} <ls>K. 346</ls>, <ls n="K.">348</ls> power to 
interest.

{@--7@} Hinting
at, reference to, taking to oneself or
assuming (as the meaning of another
word); {#svasidDaye parAkzepaH#} <ls>K. P. 2.</ls>

{@--13@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A 

figure of speech (<ab>cf.</ab> Greek paralipsis)
in which something really intended
to be said is apparently 
suppressed or denied to convey a 
particular meaning; {#AkzepaH svayamuktasya#}
{#pratizeDo vicAraRAt . caMdra#} 
{#saMdarSayAtmAnamaTavAsti priyAmuKam ..#} <ls>Kuval.</ls> For fuller 
definitions and explanations see  
<ls>K. P. 10</ls>, <ls>S. D. 714</ls> and  
{%Ākṣepaprakaraṇa%} in <ls>R. G.</ls>
